Uses of Package
org.openscience.cdk.isomorphism

  • Packages that use org.openscience.cdk.isomorphism 
    Package Description
    org.openscience.cdk.isomorphism  
    org.openscience.cdk.layout  
    org.openscience.cdk.smarts  
  • Classes in org.openscience.cdk.isomorphism used by org.openscience.cdk.isomorphism 
    Class and Description
    AtomMatcher
    Defines compatibility checking of atoms for (subgraph)-isomorphism mapping.
    BondMatcher
    Defines compatibility checking of bonds for (subgraph)-isomorphism mapping.
    DfPattern
    The depth-first (DF) backtracking sub-structure matching algorithm so named because it matches the molecule in a depth-first manner (bond by bond).
    Mappings
    A fluent interface for handling (sub)-graph mappings from a query to a target structure.
    Pattern
    A structural pattern for finding an exact matching in a target compound.
  • Classes in org.openscience.cdk.isomorphism used by org.openscience.cdk.layout 
    Class and Description
    Pattern
    A structural pattern for finding an exact matching in a target compound.
  • Classes in org.openscience.cdk.isomorphism used by org.openscience.cdk.smarts 
    Class and Description
    Mappings
    A fluent interface for handling (sub)-graph mappings from a query to a target structure.
    Pattern
    A structural pattern for finding an exact matching in a target compound.
